parameters: The couch sits with nobody to sit on it.
This is where you usually sit on the couch to knit and watch TV.
While you can't take the couch, you can see if you can take something from underneath it. Look to see if there's anything good to take?
In your search, you found your knitting needles.

This is where Papa usually sits on the couch to read with his book.
While you can't take the couch, you can see if you can take something from underneath it. Look to see if there's anything good to take?
In your search, you found an old charger for something you can't remember.
It's very old with the wire being exposed in some places, but it is long enough to be used as a possible \c[5]rope\c[0].
You decide to leave the charger where you found it.

Papa says that's a big no no number.
\n<Lily>\c[5]My name is Lily... I'm home alone and I'm scared...
\n<Lily>\c[5]I... It's my new cellphone number... I think...
\n<Lily>\c[5]But I don't have a cellphone and I don't know why I think I do...
\n<Lily>\c[5]I feel like I remember a lot of things that didn't happen to me, but did happen to me and-
\n<???>\c[5]Shh... It's okay, Lily. Everything's going to be okay.
\n<???>\c[5]You live in a house with a well by it, right? It's right outside your window?
\n<???>\c[5]Okay, Lily. I need you to wait in the living room for me and put a certain VHS tape in the TV.
\n<???>\c[5]Clip Clop and Friends Collection Part One. It's your favorite, right?
\n<???>\c[5]Good. It's going to take me a bit to get home, so you can keep putting in more movies if Clip Clop ends, okay?
\n<???>\c[5]Just don't fall asleep and keep the door unlocked. Everything is going to be okay.
\n<???>\c[5]I shouldn't talk and driv- fuck it. Sure thing.
\n<Lily>\c[5]Falling down the well... My bones hurting...
\n<Lily>\c[5]Sometimes it goes dark when I fall, but sometimes I wake up.
\n<Lily>\c[5]I... I know I woke up to hearing someone yelling from the well, but why do I remember also yelling?
\n<Lily>\c[5]Papa put a pillow on my face until I couldn't breathe...
\n<Lily>\c[5]And... And... One time he... He took out a gun and...
\n<???>\c[5]He's not going to hurt you anymore. I'm going to make sure of that.
\n<Lily>\c[5]When I heard you pick up, I think I remembered a lot more stuff...
\n<Lily>\c[5]I'm still remembering a lot and... I don't want to be alone...
\n<???>\c[5]Um... I don't know the easy way to answer that.
\n<???>\c[5]Unless I'm talking to a ghost, I think you're alive.
\n<Lily>\c[5]Papa... in one of the memories Papa said something about me learning something.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]God... How many times did he put you through this?
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]I'm sorry... You don't have to count or anything like that-
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]I'm sorry for making you drive...
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]No. I think your soul remembered my number because you wanted help.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Even if you weren't thinking about it, you called me for a reason, right?
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Um... Well I don't have a solid plan, but getting you out of there's the main goal.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]I left a note for my boyfriend's mom explaining the situation.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]She's pretty good at reading my scribbles, so it should be fine.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Oh! There's a pretty good 24/7 diner we can check out after I pick you up.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Yeah, they have killer chocolate chip pancakes!
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]They also put whipped cream on top of their chocolate milk! Plus!!! Rainbow sprinkles!!!
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]You... You can also sleep in the car if you want. You're probably tired.
You spend the hours talking with the stranger you know so well.
You feel like you've never felt this level of comfort in your life... and it's possible that might be true.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Okay. Can you open the door, Lily?
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]Your hair is a lot of colors.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Haha, it does! I dyed it myself!
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Okay, my friend Burgerman helped, but I did a lot of the work too.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]He's one of my buddies. Everyone's gonna be really psyched to see you.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]They don't know I came here yet, but it'll probably be fine.
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]What's going to happen to Papa?
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]He's going to get in trouble for what he did to you.
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]...I think his work is helping him.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]But uh... I should probably ask you this.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Are you okay with leaving? I can help you grab your stuff.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Alright kiddo. Let's pack up and grab those cakes.
The two of you pack up various things from the house, using the sheets as bundles.
The woman you were meant to replicate managed to take all of the VHS tapes off the shelf in one grab.
The tapes all fell out of her arms when she tried to pack them up though.
Soon you were left in the back seat of her car.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Just gotta finish up one thing, okay?
The longer you were left in the car, the larger the pit of anxiety in your stomach grew.
...You can hear it start to call, but hang up before anyone can pick up.
Papa said you should never call numbers you don't know.
\n<Lily>\c[5]Papa says I'm not supposed to talk to strangers...
\n<???>\c[5]Huh? Then why did you call? Do you know what time it is?
\n<???>\c[5]Look kid, just go to bed. Don't call me again.
A collection of VHS tapes can be found in the cabinets under the TV.
Some notable ones include "The Creation of the Ram Laser" and "Alchemical Egg".
Now isn't the time to watch movies.
